attributes.action: release classic cars from the scrappage scheme cars to public auction
attributes.additional_details: this e-petition is to demand the release of classic cars from the scrappage scheme to public auction, these cars are sat in an airfield awaiting their fate, we demand that the classic and historic cars be made available to the public so  they can be saved restored and put back on the road as they are important to our historic and world heritage, and are to be cherished for our future generations.
